General.Name: S.A.L. Steel Limited
General.Description: S.A.L. Steel Limited engages in the manufacture and sale of sponge iron and ferro alloys in India and internationally. It operates through Iron & Steel and Power segments. The company also offers iron ore pellets and finished steel products. Its products are primarily used in iron and steel industries. In addition, it generates and sells 40 MW power from waste heat recovery boiler and fluidized bed combustion boiler. S.A.L. Steel Limited was incorporated in 2003 and is based in Gandhinagar, India.
General.Address: Shah Alloys Corporate House, Gandhinagar, India, 382721
